item.title: Meta 2 Development Kit - Launch Video
item.description:
Meta 2 Development Kit - Launch Video

We are proud to unveil the most immersive augmented reality on the planet for the developers, creators, makers and artists who want to change the world. The Meta 2 Development Kit offers the widest field of view, the most intuitive access to digital information and direct hand interaction with holograms. All for only $949!

item.title: Microsoft is bringing 'Minecraft' to the Oculus Rift
item.description:
Microsoft is bringing 'Minecraft' to the Oculus Rift

For starters, it's worth noting that this isn't a new version of Minecraft; it has just been updated to work with the Oculus Rift. You can play in survival mode as well as join one of the many multiplayer servers out there. Once you start playing, you're presented with two different view modes.

item.title: Introducing Dragon Front: The First CCG for VR Coming to Rift
item.description:
Introducing Dragon Front: The First CCG for VR Coming to Rift

We're very excited to announce , the first collectible card game (CCG) built for VR. Developed by High Voltage and produced by Oculus Studios, Dragon Front combines traditional high fantasy with a dieselpunk aesthetic for a one-of-a-kind experience.

item.title: Sony Announces PlayStation VR Press Event For March 15
item.description:
Sony Announces PlayStation VR Press Event For March 15

With just weeks to go before the first orders of the Oculus Rift and HTC Vive find their way into buyers' living rooms, Sony is sending out press invitations for a special event highlighting the PlayStation VR to be held on March 15 in San Francisco The event is taking place during the 2016 Game Developers Conference and will begin at 2:00 PM PST followed by a few hours of demos.

item.title: HTC Vive: $799, Pre-Orders Feb 29th, Shipping Early April
item.description:
HTC Vive: $799, Pre-Orders Feb 29th, Shipping Early April

The HTC official blog today confirmed details of the consumer Vive: It's a Vive Pre, minus the Pre.

item.title: UPDATE: AR Startup Meta Being Accused of Stealing Designs
item.description:
UPDATE: AR Startup Meta Being Accused of Stealing Designs

Bold claims are being made against Meta by someone claiming to represent PhaseSpace Motion Capture. Did Meta's AR glasses design breach an NDA?

item.title: Acer Set To Launch First VR Device In First Half of 2016 | Androidheadlines.com
item.description:
Acer Set To Launch First VR Device In First Half of 2016 | Androidheadlines.com

With the smartphone industry stagnating in terms of revenue growth, tech companies are searching for that one magic formula that will get them back on the track of high growth rates experienced by the likes of Samsung, Xiaomi and others not so long ago.

item.title: Leap Motion's Orion Release Brings Massive Finger Tracking Improvements
item.description:
Leap Motion's Orion Release Brings Massive Finger Tracking Improvements

A friend of mine always used to say 'if your keyboard only worked 60% of the time, you would throw it against the wall.' We expect our technology to work every time, and when it fails we get infinitely frustrated.

item.title: The Void Debuts Rapture Headset And Vest At TED
item.description:
The Void Debuts Rapture Headset And Vest At TED

Attendees at the TED conference this week in Vancouver will be setting their eyes on the custom headset and haptic vest from The Void.

item.title: Meet The New Sulon Cortex VR Headset, Coming Spring 2016
item.description:
Meet The New Sulon Cortex VR Headset, Coming Spring 2016

We took a peek behind the curtain of Sulon's secretive website to get a glimpse at what's coming.
